name: European Health Futures Forum
memberOrga:
Members are individuals, with their CVs and photos posted on the EHFF website. A number represent organisations but are members of EHFF in their own right.
EHFF has associated member status with a number of European organisations e.g. ECHAlliance, EHMA, EFPC and is a founder member of ENOPE., with which it is currently  formal affiliated. It has recently taken on a caretaker role for the European Society for Quality in Healthcare until ESQH becomes financially viable.
goal: The European Health Futures Forum an open interactive network, which seeks out, processes and exchanges knowledge and information in real time to influence the future of health and healthcare in Europe and provide a better understanding of future possibilities for healthier lives and communities.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Food Safety, Information Society, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Youth
